actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Efficiency, Federalism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Efficiency, Federalism, and the District of Columbia

official_title: A bill to require the District of Columbia to reimburse Fairfax County, and Prince William County, for costs incurred in relation to the Lorton Prison.

summary.text: Requires the District of Columbia to reimburse Fairfax County and Prince William County, Virginia, for expenses those Counties incur in responding to Lorton prison escapes and disturbances. Requires the Mayor of the District of Columbia to report to certain congressional committees regarding such reimbursements.

titles.title: A bill to require the District of Columbia to reimburse Fairfax County, and Prince William County, for costs incurred in relation to the Lorton Prison.
